Ping_Minimap_Turn_Off_By_Time_Tooltip:
Disable minimap pings
after (x) game time (minutes)
Tormentor_notif_tooltip:
Show pings on the minimap
 until a new tormentor appears (only you can see)
Tormentor_Before_Spawn_Timer: Time until notification of the Tormentor spawn
Tormentor_Before_Spawn_Timer_Tooltip: The time is given in seconds
